sentences.sContent: Thousands of people will starve if food doesn’t reach the city.
sentences.sCn: 如果食品不能运到那座城市，成千上万的人就要饿死。

sentences.sContent: They’ll either die from the cold or starve to death (= die from lack of food ) .
sentences.sCn: 他们要么会冻死，要么会饿死。

remMethod.val: star(明星) + ve → 和明星养尊处优的生活正相反 → 挨饿

words.tran: 挨饿的，饥饿的；饿瘦了的；贫穷的

trans.tranOther: to suffer or die because you do not have enough to eat
